g.title: luminous-mind-activity-diagram

a.text: High level process of a luminous mind

g.title: spawn seed of consciousness
has requisites for 9th Jhana?
spawn seed of consciousness->has requisites for 9th Jhana?
dwells in the 9th Jhana
has fuel remaining?
dwells in the 9th Jhana->has fuel remaining?
dependently co-arise time-&-space context
dependently co-arise present kamma
dependently co-arise time-&-space context->dependently co-arise present kamma
dependently co-arise sensation
dependently co-arise present kamma->dependently co-arise sensation
has requisites for 4th Jhana?
dependently co-arise sensation->has requisites for 4th Jhana?
dwells in line with causation of perception attainments of 4th Jhana
g.text: dwells in line with causation of perception attainments of 4th Jhana

g.title: dwells in line with causation of perception attainments of 4th Jhana->has fuel remaining?
__start
__start->has fuel remaining?
has fuel remaining?->spawn seed of consciousness
__end
has fuel remaining?->__end
has requisites for 9th Jhana?->dwells in the 9th Jhana
has requisites for 9th Jhana?->dependently co-arise time-&-space context
has requisites for 4th Jhana?->dwells in line with causation of perception attainments of 4th Jhana
dwells in line with causation of perception attainments

g.title: has requisites for 4th Jhana?->dwells in line with causation of perception attainments
